title: 1 v 1 for weekly rewards? Potential idea
body:
So I recently discovered this little cool thing, pretty much a site where you sign up, link your League account, then 1 v 1 randoms to earn "coins" which can later be used to buy RP. Sounds like a scam? Funny enough its not, only catch is, its gonna take you A LOT of wins before you can get anything. But it's still worth it in the long run if you're willing to put time into it. 

Now this also got me thinking of a cool idea, having a 1 v 1 game mode where you can earn weekly rewards. Say every 10 wins you get a key fragment? Also adding a reward limit for those players who try to abuse the system. I think it would be awesome and would give a fresh new vibe for players who want a quick fast paced game while also having something to work towards. Would also save me from having to use 3rd party programs as well hahaha.
